dcterms:creator: W. Al-Dhabyani
M. Gomaa
H. Khaled
A. Fahmy
dcterms:description: The Breast Ultrasound Image (BUSI) dataset is a classification and segmentation resource comprising ultrasound images from 600 female patients aged 25 to 75, collected in 2018. It contains 780 PNG images, categorized into normal, benign, and malignant classes, with 133 normal, 437 benign, and 210 malignant images.
dcterms:title: BUSI Dataset

dcterms:creator: M. H. Yap
M. Goyal
F. Osman
R. Martí
E. Denton
A. Juette
R. Zwiggelaar
dcterms:description: Dataset B contains 163 images with an average size of 760×570 pixels, collected using the Siemens ACUSON Sequoia C512 system. It includes 109 benign cases and 54 malignant cases.
dcterms:title: Dataset B
